essentials.name: Essentials
essentials.short_description: Remake of the famous Essentials(X) Bukkit/Spigot plugin for Obsidian.
essentials.author: Czompi

versions.change_log:
### End-user notes:
- Added `/setwarp <name>` (fully working)
- Added `/warp <name>` (fully working)
- Added `/warps` (fully working)
- Added `/sethome <name>` (fully working)
- Added `/home <name>` (fully working)
- Added `/homes` (fully working)
- Added `/essentials <reload|debug|commands>` (fully working)
- Added `/gc` (fully working)
- Added `/gm <0|1|2|3>` (fully working)
- Fixed `motd.txt` to show world time and online players count (when player joins to server) and added possibility to list all of the players on `motd.txt`
- Added language support (every language has been added that is available for EssentialsX)

### Dev notes:
#### Fixed & registered things:
- Registered `WarpCommandModule`
- Fixed `warps` folder missing issue
- Fixed `/essentials` command.
- Fixed `/gm <0|1|2|3>` command.

#### Added functions:
- Added `AddWarp(String, WarpConfig, Obsidian.API.IPlayer)` function
- Added `AddHome(Obsidian.API.IPlayer, HomeConfig)` function (not finished yet)
- Refactoring config manager (added `LoadConfig()`, `SaveConfig()`, `ReloadConfig()` functions for bunch managing configs & added `LoadSingleConfig(EConfigs, string, string, out String)`, `SaveSingleConfig(EConfigs, string, string, object?)`, `ReloadSingleConfig(EConfigs type, string, string, out String)` functions to manage configs separately).
- Added `RenderClickableCommand(String, String, String)` function
- Modified `RenderCommandUsage(String, String)` function to use `Obsidian.API.IChatMessage` and `Obsidian.API.ITextComponent`. interfaces.
- Updated to the latest version of Obsidian.API

#### Added Extensions:
- `HasPermission(String)` for `Obsidian.API.IPlayer`
- `ToColoredString(String)` for `Obsidian.API.Position`
- `ToColoredString(String, ChatColor)` for `Obsidian.API.Position`
- `ToColoredString(String)` for `Essentials.Configs.Position`
- `ToColoredString(String, ChatColor)` for `Essentials.Configs.Position`
- `ToEssentialsPosition()` for `Obsidian.API.Position`
- `ToObsidianPosition()` for `Essentials.Configs.Position`

*I hope, that I wrote everything here, that is changed.*
